parts: i have a student asking me for General Paper tuition (Singapore). He is at the JC2 level. Please recommend reputable tuition centers in Singapore for him.

Got it! I will research reputable tuition centers in Singapore that specialize in General Paper (GP) for JC2 students. I will focus on centers with strong track records, experienced tutors, and good student reviews.

I'll get back to you with the findings soon.

parts:
# Top GP Tuition Centres in Singapore for JC2 Students

In Singapore, several tuition centres offer **specialized General Paper (GP) programs** tailored for JC2 (Junior College Year 2) students. Below are some **reputable centres** known for experienced tutors, strong track records of student success, and positive reviews. Key details like pricing, teaching methodology, and class format (physical/online) are included for each:

## The Thought Tailor Learning Centre (GP Specialist)
- **Experienced Tutors:** Staffed by award-winning **ex-MOE teachers** and top graduates from prestigious universities (Cambridge, Oxford, etc.), ensuring high-quality instruction【19†L118-L126】. The team is led by educators like Mr. Russell (former MOE teacher with a Cambridge postgraduate distinction) who design the GP curriculum.  
- **Track Record:** Since its establishment in 2019, the centre boasts a *high success rate* – about **96.3% of students achieved A or B grades in GP**, with most improving by 3 grades【19†L146-L154】. Over 1,850 students have attained A/B in exams under their guidance【19†L144-L151】. Student satisfaction is extremely high (nearly **98.7% gave a 5-star rating in 2022**)【19†L148-L151】.  
- **Teaching Methodology:** Emphasizes a **structured, skills-based learning** approach. Tutors provide step-by-step guidance for essay writing and comprehension, focusing on exam techniques and higher-order thinking skills【19†L128-L136】【19†L137-L145】. A dedicated curriculum research team (led by Master's/PhD holders from Cambridge/Oxford) updates materials annually【19†L129-L137】. Students receive constant feedback and **24/7 support**, ensuring doubts are clarified quickly【19†L136-L139】.  
- **Class Format:** Small group classes conducted at physical **branches in Novena, Bukit Timah, and Bugis**【19†L103-L112】. Class sizes are kept small for personal attention. The centre offers **free trial lessons**, and even provides a financial assistance scheme (up to 50% fee waiver) for eligible students【19†L138-L142】. While lessons are primarily in-person, tutors are readily available outside class (via consultation or messaging) to support students’ learning【19†L136-L139】.  
- **Pricing:** **JC2 GP tuition fees are about S\$90 per lesson** (before any early-bird discounts)【19†L154-L160】. This works out to roughly S\$360 per month for weekly lessons. (Early registration discounts can lower it to S\$85/lesson【19†L154-L159】.) The fees are relatively affordable given the quality, and many parents/students find value in the results.  

## Irwin’s Study (GP Tuition by Irwin See)
- **Experienced Tutor:** Founded by **Mr. Irwin See**, a former MOE JC lecturer with a Master’s degree from Oxford University【37†L838-L846】. Irwin is a highly sought-after GP tutor known for his expertise and engaging teaching style. His credentials (RI alumnus, Oxford and LSE graduate) and experience ensure top-notch GP guidance【37†L838-L846】【24†L47-L55】.  
- **Track Record:** Irwin’s Study has a **strong track record** of consistently producing excellent GP results. Every year, about **80% of students score an ‘A’ or ‘B’ in the A-Level GP exam**【37†L889-L897】, and **over 80% even attain an ‘A’ (distinction)** in many cohorts【25†L1-L4】. Since 2009, more than 1,000 students have excelled in GP under Irwin’s mentorship【32†L63-L70】. This proven success rate, well above national averages, cements its reputation as a top GP center.  
- **Teaching Methodology:** Classes are **interactive and exam-focused**. Irwin emphasizes understanding the GP syllabus requirements and covers **both Paper 1 (essay) and Paper 2 (comprehension/AQ) in depth** – often alternating focus weekly so nothing is neglected【37†L909-L918】. He provides structured guidance on essay structure, tackling different question types, and answering techniques unique to GP【37†L899-L907】. Students receive concise, relevant notes (avoiding unnecessarily lengthy readings) to build content knowledge without overwhelm【27†L55-L63】. His **dynamic teaching style** keeps lessons engaging, with lively discussions on current affairs that train students’ critical thinking【32†L77-L85】【32†L85-L93】. Many students praise his dedication – *“actively engages his students and always respects their opinions,”* making GP “brimming with life and relevance” instead of a dull subject【32†L78-L82】【32†L87-L95】.  
- **Class Format:** Offers **both physical and live online classes**. Students can attend in-person sessions at the **Bukit Timah (West) centre or Tampines (East) centre**【37†L865-L874】【37†L874-L882】. For those with busy schedules or who prefer remote learning, **online lessons are available in real-time**, covering the same content as physical classes【37†L844-L852】【37†L893-L897】. Online students can interact with the tutor, ask questions, and even arrange one-on-one consultations just like in regular classes【37†L844-L852】. This dual-mode flexibility ensures no student misses out.  
- **Pricing:** *Exact fees* for Irwin’s Study are not publicly listed here, but the cost is **competitive with other top GP tuitions**. (In 3rd-party listings, Irwin’s Study is noted at around *S\$340 per month* for weekly GP lessons【34†L25-L33】, similar to the market rate.) The centre also partners with MENDAKI to provide **subsidised tuition for underprivileged students**, reflecting its commitment to accessibility【37†L885-L894】.  
- **Student Reviews:** Irwin’s Study enjoys **glowing reviews**. Students often highlight that Mr. Irwin’s clear and patient teaching helped them **leap from borderline grades to A’s in GP**【22†L77-L84】. They appreciate his thorough coverage of all GP components and the exclusive tips he provides – *“tips not available anywhere else, you can only learn them from Mr. See!”*【37†L910-L918】. The supportive classroom atmosphere and significant improvements reported by past students speak to the centre’s quality.

## Zenith Education Studio (JC GP Tuition Program)
- **Experienced Tutors & Curriculum:** Zenith is a leading JC tuition chain (MOE-registered) known for its **highly-experienced tutors** and robust curriculum. GP classes are taught by tutors adept in A-Level requirements; the centre prides itself on imparting effective exam strategies. According to Zenith, their GP tutors are *“highly experienced”* in coaching students on **scoring criteria and skills to articulate ideas effectively** in essays, Application Questions, and comprehension【13†L7-L15】. These **experienced tutors** focus on exam techniques, helping students approach GP exams with confidence and precision【13†L19-L27】.  
- **Track Record:** Zenith’s GP track record is outstanding – about **two-thirds of their students score an A grade**, and **over 90% achieve either an A or B** in the A-level GP exam【9†L98-L102】. This success rate is roughly **double the national average** for GP【9†L98-L102】. The centre highlights that its results “speak for themselves,” reflecting both the quality of teaching and the support system in place. Since its founding in 2019, Zenith has taught over 10,000 students across subjects, building a strong reputation in JC tuition【9†L112-L120】.  
- **Teaching Methodology:** Zenith provides a **comprehensive GP program** that blends content mastery with skills practice. Lessons are structured around analysis of past exam trends and common question types. Students get **in-depth practice for Paper 1 and Paper 2**, including plenty of essay writing drills and comprehension practice. Although classes are in small-group format, each student receives personal attention through **free one-on-one consultations** outside class, especially as exams near【36†L7-L15】. The centre also integrates technology and offers resources like summary notes and 24/7 online help – for example, students have access to a Telegram channel with regular GP updates and can seek help anytime【5†L337-L343】. This multi-faceted approach (group instruction + individual support + online resources) helps cater to different learning needs.  
- **Class Format:** **Physical classes** are conducted at Zenith’s numerous branches islandwide (e.g. Suntec City, Bishan, Bukit Timah, Paya Lebar, etc.), making it convenient for students across Singapore【9†L18-L27】【9†L30-L38】. Class sizes are moderate (Zenith averages ~8 students per GP class, capped around 15) to allow interaction yet maintain quality【5†L321-L329】【5†L323-L331】. Students who miss a lesson can attend **make-up classes within the same week**【36†L7-L15】, ensuring continuity in learning. In addition, Zenith is known for its flexibility in offering **consultations both in-person and online**; tutors have even been noted to extend help on weekends or late nights via online calls leading up to exams, underscoring their dedication【36†L41-L46】. (During the pandemic, Zenith successfully ran live online classes; now they primarily operate in-person, with online support as needed.)  
- **Pricing:** Zenith’s GP tuition is priced at **approximately S\$380–S\$400 per month** for JC2 students. Specifically, *J2 GP fees are around S\$400 for 4 lessons* (i.e. S\$100 per 2-hour lesson)【11†L1-L8】【11†L7-L9】. J1 students pay slightly less (about S\$380 for 4 lessons)【11†L1-L8】. This fee covers the full suite of support – including any extra consults and materials. Free trial classes are often available for new students to experience the lessons firsthand【13†L13-L18】.  
- **Student Feedback:** Zenith receives **positive reviews** for its student-centric approach. Many JC students credit Zenith for significant grade improvements, citing the centre’s effective practices and supportive teachers. For instance, one student shared that after joining Zenith for GP/Econs, they had *“plenty of practice for essays”* and could clarify all doubts through the **free consultations**, which helped turn a weak foundation into an A at A-Levels【36†L31-L39】. Others highlight that the **dedication of Zenith’s tutors is “like no other,”** noting that teachers go the extra mile (even offering extra help outside class) to ensure students succeed【36†L41-L46】. Overall, Zenith is praised for combining results-driven teaching with a caring, flexible support system.

## Learners’ Lodge (JC Tuition Specialist)
- **Overview:** Learners’ Lodge is a well-established tuition provider **specializing in JC subjects**, including GP. With **7 outlets across Singapore**, it’s one of the most accessible and popular choices for A-Level tuition【34†L1-L9】. The centre has made a name through its experienced teaching team and comprehensive coverage of the JC curriculum.  
- **Experienced Tutors:** All GP tutors at Learners’ Lodge are **highly qualified**, many being former JC lecturers or educators with extensive experience teaching General Paper in top schools (e.g. tutors who taught at NJC, RJC, VJC)【34†L3-L9】. This wealth of experience means they understand the common pitfalls and expectations of the A-Level GP exam. Tutors are chosen not only for content mastery but also for their ability to engage and mentor college students effectively.  
- **Teaching Methodology:** The GP program at Learners’ Lodge uses a **holistic approach**. It focuses on ensuring students understand the requirements of different question types (both essay and comprehension) and equipping them with the necessary skills to tackle each【34†L5-L13】. Lessons cover **essay writing techniques, critical thinking development, and examination time-management skills**. The curriculum is closely aligned with the MOE syllabus, and sessions are often tailored to the needs of students from different JCs (since different schools may emphasize different topics or question styles)【34†L25-L33】. This tailored program helps bridge gaps specific to each student’s school background. By the end of the course, students are expected to be independent thinkers who can dissect GP questions and craft coherent arguments.  
- **Track Record:** Learners’ Lodge has a **strong track record** as a premium JC tuition centre. It has helped numerous students secure As and Bs in GP over the years (the centre often cites significant grade jumps among its GP cohort). Its reputation is evidenced by large enrollments and word-of-mouth referrals from past students. While exact figures vary, the centre consistently produces results above national averages – one reason it’s widely recommended for GP. In reviews, many students report **notable improvements in GP grades** after attending, attributing success to the centre’s structured guidance.  
- **Class Format:** **Physical classes** are conducted at all 7 branches (located in central and heartland areas, convenient to most JC campuses)【34†L1-L9】. Classes are usually in a **small-to-medium group format**, allowing for peer discussion while still giving tutors bandwidth to address individual questions. The centre provides notes and practice papers, and some tutors hold extra consultation sessions near exam periods. During COVID-19, Learners’ Lodge shifted to online Zoom classes, and it has since maintained an ability to conduct **online lessons or make-ups when necessary**. However, the primary mode is in-person instruction. The multiple outlets and large team of tutors also mean students can find a class slot that fits their schedule.  
- **Pricing:** **GP tuition at Learners’ Lodge is approximately S\$340 per month** for JC2 students【34†L25-L33】. (This typically covers 4 weekly lessons in a month.) The fees include comprehensive materials and occasional extra sessions. A one-time registration fee may apply for new students. Despite being a premium centre, Learners’ Lodge’s prices are on par with other top GP tuition providers, and many families find the results worth the investment.  
- **Student Reviews:** Learners’ Lodge garners **positive reviews**, especially for its GP tutors’ dedication. One JC2 student noted, *“I’ve been having classes at Learners’ Lodge since J1. **Mr. Lo is very attentive and caring**, ensuring lessons are well thought-out and effective. He’s always willing to spend additional time for consultations and to mark extra practice material, which I am very grateful for.”*【34†L31-L38】 This kind of feedback is common – students appreciate the **personal mentorship** and commitment of the GP teachers. Many credit the centre for boosting their confidence in GP, improving essay structures, and honing their skills to secure that A in the A-Levels.

## Illum.e (General Paper Tuition by illum.e)
- **Experienced Educators:** **illum.e** (pronounced "illume") is a specialist English/GP tuition centre led by a team of **highly trained and sought-after teachers** with decades of teaching experience【3†L226-L234】. The tutors are not only seasoned in classroom teaching but are also **industry experts** in education – some even consult for schools and education organizations on curriculum design【3†L228-L236】. This strong grounding in educational theory and practice translates into effective teaching methods in class.  
- **Unique Pedagogy & Results:** The centre employs a **unique pedagogy** that has yielded strong academic performance for **thousands of students** over the years【3†L230-L238】. Illum.e’s approach is continually refined through thorough analysis of national exam trends and school papers, ensuring it stays ahead of the curve【3†L230-L238】. While specific success percentages aren’t publicly quoted, the testimonials and demand for its classes speak to a **proven track record**. Many of their GP students have seen significant grade improvements and ultimately excelled at the A-Levels.  
- **Teaching Methodology:** Illum.e is known for its **innovative and rigorous teaching methods** for GP. Key features of their program include:  
  - **Thorough Exam Preparation:** Tutors conduct **in-depth analysis of past GP exam questions** (both Paper 1 and Paper 2) to teach students how to spot patterns and tackle various question types【5†L335-L343】. Skills lectures are provided to break down how to approach essays and application questions step-by-step.  
  - **High-Quality Materials:** Students receive constantly updated **notes and model essays**. These notes distill complex issues into digestible points, and are frequently updated to include current affairs examples. Illum.e avoids information overload; instead of overwhelming students with thick packets, they provide concise, **scaffolded notes and tutorials** that build up competencies gradually【5†L335-L343】.  
  - **Skills & Language Focus:** Beyond content, the curriculum places emphasis on **language proficiency and critical thinking**. They include “language grade boosters” – essentially strategies and exercises to improve vocabulary, grammar and expression for GP【5†L337-L343】. This is paired with training in argumentation and analysis to tackle essay and comprehension questions.  
  - **Use of EdTech:** Illum.e integrates educational technology into lessons (interactive components, online quizzes, etc.) to enhance engagement【5†L337-L343】. Students also get access to a Telegram channel with regular GP updates (current affairs snippets, article links, quick tips), keeping learning continuous outside class【5†L339-L343】.  
  - **Personalized Support:** Although classes are group-based, each student gets attention. **Class sizes are kept small (about 3–12 students)**【3†L278-L281】. The centre offers a **free diagnostic assessment** for new students to identify strengths and weaknesses【5†L335-L343】. Tutors are very approachable – Illum.e provides **free 24/7 consultations**, meaning students can reach out anytime with questions and get help (often via text or email)【5†L339-L343】. Closer to exams, extra revision sessions and intensive workshops are held to reinforce learning.  
- **Class Format:** **Physical classes** are available at **multiple campuses**: Jurong East, Thomson, and Bukit Timah【3†L268-L277】. These locations are convenient for students living in different parts of Singapore. All centres follow the same high standards and curriculum. Lessons are conducted in-person in small seminar-style classrooms to facilitate discussion. As noted, a strong online support component exists (through chats and resources), though **full online classes are not the main mode** – the emphasis is on face-to-face interaction augmented by tech. Illum.e does allow trial lessons, so students can experience a class before committing【3†L243-L246】【1†L153-L156】. During the peak of the pandemic, they ran online classes; now they have largely reverted to in-person, with safety measures and the aforementioned hybrid support tools.  
- **Pricing:** Illum.e’s GP tuition is **moderately priced**. **General Paper lessons cost about S\$80 for a 2-hour session**【5†L327-L334】【5†L331-L339】. Typically, there is one lesson per week, so the monthly fee is roughly S\$320 (which is competitive for small-group specialist tuition). They do not charge extra for the additional consultations or materials – those are included as part of the service. This transparent fee structure, combined with the results, makes Illum.e a strong value-for-money option for many JC2 students.  
- **Student Reviews:** The centre enjoys **excellent reviews from students**, many of whom come via recommendations. Learners often mention the *passionate and caring nature* of Illum.e’s GP tutors. For example, one Hwa Chong student shared, *“the teachers have been so approachable and accommodating… Illum.e’s GP department comprises some of the **best teachers**; besides being extremely caring, they also manage to **teach GP in a digestible manner**!”*【5†L345-L352】. Another student from Eunoia JC praised how the tutor accepted essay submissions for extra feedback and taught strategies that *“made GP a less daunting subject to study for”*【5†L353-L361】. These positive testimonials highlight Illum.e’s supportive environment and effective pedagogy that translate into tangible improvements and newfound confidence in GP.

## The Learning Lab (GP Programme)
- **Profile:** **The Learning Lab (TLL)** is one of Singapore’s largest and most reputable tuition centres, known for its premium programs from primary to JC. While not GP-exclusive, TLL offers a well-developed **General Paper programme for JC1 and JC2** students as part of its suite of offerings. Its GP classes leverage TLL’s broader strengths: a rigorous curriculum, experienced teachers, and holistic educational approach.  
- **Experienced Teachers & Curriculum:** TLL’s GP tutors are **well-qualified and trained** under the centre’s stringent hiring program. They follow an in-house curriculum that is **aligned with the MOE syllabus** and frequently updated. TLL places a big emphasis on quality of instruction – teachers undergo regular pedagogical training and content updates. The result is a program that not only prepares students for the A-Level GP exam, but also **nurtures critical thinking and effective communication**, skills TLL values across all subjects. As TLL describes, their approach *“takes learning to the next level by nurturing curiosity and critical thinking”*, ensuring students excel academically *while* developing a genuine love for learning【6†L187-L194】.  
- **Teaching Methodology:** The Learning Lab’s GP classes focus on building a **strong foundation in general knowledge, argumentation, and language**. Each lesson typically covers world issues/themes (to broaden students’ content knowledge for essays) and specific skills (e.g. how to craft strong thesis statements, how to analyze comprehension passages). The methodology encourages **intellectual engagement**: students are prompted to discuss and debate topics, ask questions, and connect ideas. This Socratic style helps them form nuanced viewpoints – crucial for GP essays. TLL provides proprietary **materials** each week, including summary notes on current affairs, vocabulary lists, sample essays, and practice questions. Homework and assignments are given to reinforce what’s taught. The centre also tracks each student’s progress; tutors give periodic feedback and suggestions for improvement. Overall, the teaching style balances **exam-centric training** (practising past A-Level questions, timed practices, etc.) with fostering a broader understanding of issues – striking a balance between drilling and enrichment.  
- **Track Record:** As a long-standing institution, The Learning Lab has a **strong track record** of students achieving good results. Many of its GP students have attained A’s and B’s in the A-Levels. While exact GP stats aren’t published, TLL’s overall A-Level outcomes are impressive – it’s common to hear of TLL students scoring well above national averages in their subjects. The centre’s reputation is bolstered by testimonials from top scorers and a history of students from TLL entering local and overseas universities. In terms of GP specifically, TLL’s focus on critical thinking often gives students an edge in essay writing. Parents often remark that their child’s writing and analytical skills improved markedly after joining the programme. TLL has also been recognized in publications and guides as a top choice for English and GP tuition due to its comprehensive approach.  
- **Class Format:** TLL runs **physical GP classes at multiple branches** (e.g. Jurong, Tampines, Bukit Timah, Bishan, Novena, etc. – essentially wherever there’s a TLL centre, there will be a GP class)【31†L156-L164】. Class sizes are usually around 10–12 students for JC level, which allows some interaction while maintaining focus. The Learning Lab also embraces a **blended learning format**: alongside in-person lessons, they provide online resources and have options for **online classes**. In fact, TLL offers a *“comprehensive blended learning experience by combining online and in-person learning”* via its learning management system【41†L9-L17】. For example, students can access digital lesson recaps, extra practice quizzes, and even attend certain sessions virtually if needed. During the pandemic, TLL seamlessly shifted to fully online classes; now they have resumed mostly physical classes but continue to offer **TLL Online** as a parallel (as of recent info, online GP classes might be arranged on specific schedules for those who prefer them). This flexibility ensures students can learn in the format that suits them best.  
- **Pricing:** The Learning Lab is known for its **premium pricing**. For JC2 GP, fees are roughly **S\$160–170 per lesson**, translating to about **S\$640–680 per month (4 lessons)**【42†L237-L245】. Rates may differ slightly for weekday vs weekend classes (weekend classes tend to be a bit costlier)【42†L237-L242】. Additionally, new students pay a one-time registration fee of S\$98 and a refundable deposit【42†L239-L247】. These fees are inclusive of materials and GST. Despite the high cost, many parents consider TLL’s comprehensive materials, well-structured program, and proven results to justify the investment. The centre often has waitlists for popular class slots, indicating strong demand even at these price points.  
- **Student Reviews:** TLL has a **mixed but generally positive reputation** among students. Many JC students who attend praise the **rich resources and rigorous practice** they get. They often feel more prepared for GP after going through TLL’s program, citing improvements in essay writing and broader general knowledge. Some testimonials highlight that TLL’s GP lessons helped them “*think more critically about issues*” and write with greater depth, which translated into better exam performance. That said, The Learning Lab’s style can be fast-paced and demanding; students who are self-motivated tend to thrive in this environment. On the whole, TLL is respected for professionalism and quality – it’s a go-to choice for those seeking a structured, well-resourced GP tuition with a long-standing track record. (For a more personalised or small-centre touch, students sometimes opt for the above-mentioned specialized centres; but for a **big-name, stable program**, TLL remains a top contender.)

**References:** All information compiled from publicly available sources, including education review sites, official tuition centre pages, and student testimonials:

- Sophia Education – *“10 Best GP Tuition Centres in Singapore”* (overview of top GP tuition providers)【1†L141-L148】【1†L149-L156】.  
- *The Best Singapore* education review – *“The Thought Tailor Learning Centre Review”* (tutor credentials, track record, fees)【19†L118-L126】【19†L146-L154】.  
- *The Thought Tailor* official site and blog (program highlights and methodology for GP tuition)【19†L128-L136】【19†L137-L145】.  
- *Irwin’s Study* official site (founder’s profile and success rates)【25†L1-L4】【24†L47-L55】; TutorCity *Top 30 JC Tuition* review (track record, online class availability, student feedback for Irwin’s Study)【37†L889-L897】【37†L899-L907】.  
- *Zenith Education Studio* official GP page (track record statistics, fees)【9†L98-L102】【11†L7-L9】; TutorCity review (Zenith’s class policies and teacher support)【36†L7-L15】【36†L41-L46】.  
- *SingaporeTuitionTeachers.com – 30 Top GP Tuition Choices* (details on Learners’ Lodge and others: tutor experience, fees, student comment)【34†L3-L11】【34†L25-L33】.  
- *illum.e* GP tuition info from Sophia Education and tuition review sites (pedagogy, class size, student testimonials)【3†L226-L234】【5†L335-L343】【5†L345-L352】.  
- *The Learning Lab* official site (program description and fees)【6†L187-L194】【42†L237-L245】; The Learning Lab LMS description (blended learning approach)【41†L9-L17】.

metadata.title: Best JC Tuition in Singapore - Top 30 Comprehensive Review
metadata.text: I love that Mr See never neglects any of the sections in the GP paper. We practise paper 1 for one week, then paper 2 the following week, and the cycle repeats. I find this continuous “cycle” very helpful in helping me to remember the skills required to master GP. Mr See also puts in the extra effort to pick out unique words for us to remember. This is to strengthen our grasp of the English language, and to ensure that we do well for the language component of GP. In class, we are also taught special methods/tips to do well in GP, these tips are not available anywhere else, you can only learn of them from Mr See!

metadata.title: Best JC Tuition in Singapore - Top 30 Comprehensive Review
metadata.text: Mr Irwin's teaching style really suited me and has indeed helped me grasped GP better. As a person who learns through analysing sample essays or answers, Mr Irwin has helped me to gain a better understanding of writing a proper the essay structure, identifying different question types in both essays and SAQs, applying the different answering techniques and also providing adequate resource materials for content preparation. Additionally with the alternation of focusing between paper 1 and paper 2 every 2 weeks, it has helped me to balance my efforts in improving those both components of GP.
